timeline.bodyText: This is going to block the F/J pool thread. Is it the intended behavior?
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: It is not. I will refactor this.
replies.author: newportd

timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: Yes, they are. I will refactor this and the subscription calls to happen asynchronously.
replies.author: newportd

replies.bodyText: I've pushed this refactor as well.
replies.author: newportd

timeline.message: refactor subscriber. ensure calls to FlowableEmitter.onNext are serialized across threads.
doc update to remove ack-deadline config option
